name: stinke (BETA)
description:
WELCOME

This game is about being a type of monkey breed called a gray langur. Have fun going monkey and let me know if there is a current bug with the game. 

BETA

This game is currently in beta and there will be issues with it. Issues that I found are the barrier ceiling being too low and the soccer ball not moving. Please don't ask me to fix these as I will later on in a new update of the game.

Why is the name stinke

It's just a beta name I thought of because this game isn't fully done and I still have yet a lot of stuff I plan to add. But I want people to test the game and give me feedback to help me understand what I should do to the game.
